channel.title: Custom on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Custom on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Brrrand'n
item.description: Th' Relearrrn theme provides configurat'n opt'ns t' change yer your site’s colors, favicon an' logo. This allows ye t' easily align yer ship visuals t' yer desired style. Most o' these opt'ns be exposed thru so called color variants. A color variant lets ye cust'mize various visual effects o' yer ship like almost any color, used fonts, color schemes o' print, rules highligtn'n, Merrrmaid an' th' OpenAPI shortcode, etc. It contains o' a CSS file an' optional configurat'n opt'ns 'n yer hugo.
